summary: I’m dynamic, results-focused full life cycle recruiting professional with commitment to client service and creative recruitment. I’ve track record of success in locating, identifying and closing top candidate with a special emphasis on hard to fill positions. I have the ability to self-manage multiple positions by sourcing, screening, qualifying, coordinating interviews, negotiating and closing top notch talent to fill a variety of senior level technical, managerial and executive positions.
